item.title: 华尔街对首次公开募股的看好仅限于此
item.description:
加密货币、人工智能产品表现出色，而其他产品则举步维艰。【原文：

Crypto, AI offerings are doing fine, even as other listings struggle.

】

item.title: Whoop 不顾 FDA 警告，拒绝移除血压工具
item.description: 无屏健身手环制造商 Whoop 公司表示，尽管美国食品和药物管理局提出了要求，但该公司不会禁用其血压跟踪工具。【原文：Whoop Inc., the maker of screen-less fitness bands, said it will not disable its blood-pressure tracking tool despite a request from the US Food and Drug Administration.】

item.title: 在以高昂代价涉足食品外卖领域后，京东的收入攀升
item.description: JD.com Inc. 6 月份的收入增长比预期快 22%，这主要得益于政府引导的消费补贴，以及积极进军餐饮外卖等新领域。【原文：JD.com Inc.’s revenue grew a faster-than-anticipated 22% in the June quarter, benefiting from government-directed consumer subsidies as well as an aggressive drive into new arenas such as meal delivery.】

item.title: 瑞银建议进行期权对交易，以追随 S&P 500 指数的升势
item.description: 美国股市缓慢而稳步地走高，这让交易商们感到十分痛苦，因为他们预计唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税政策会破坏已经持续了四个多月的涨势。【原文：The slow and steady march higher in the US stock market has been a painful ride for traders expecting President Donald Trump’s tariffs to derail a rally that’s lasted for more than four months.】

item.title: 土耳其央行称降息并非 "自动驾驶
item.description: 土耳其央行表示，其货币政策并不在预设的轨道上，在上个月开始降低借贷成本后，几乎没有就未来降息的幅度提供任何迹象。【原文：Turkey’s central bank said its monetary policy isn’t on a preset path, providing little indication on the size of future interest-rate cuts after it began lowering borrowing costs last month.】

item.title: 印度信用评级在特朗普加征关税数日后被上调
item.description: 印度获得了 S&P 全球评级公司更高的投资级评级，该评级公司称印度经济的增长前景不会因唐纳德-特朗普总统对印度征收 50%的关税而受到影响。【原文：India secured a higher investment grade rating from S&P Global Ratings, which said the economy’s growth prospects won’t be derailed by President Donald Trump 50% tariff shock to the country.】

item.title: 瑞士部长在关税危机中与罗氏和诺华会面
item.description: 瑞士政府与罗氏控股公司（Roche Holding AG）和诺华股份公司（Novartis AG）的高管会面，讨论制药业在美国关税影响下的处境。【原文：The Swiss government met with executives of Roche Holding AG and Novartis AG to discuss the pharmaceutical industry’s situation in light of US tariffs.】

item.title: 长江和记合并带来一次性亏损，利润骤降 92
item.description: 由于与沃达丰集团（Vodafone Group Plc）合并后出现一次性非现金亏损，长江和记控股有限公司上半年的利润下降了 92%。【原文：CK Hutchison Holdings Ltd.’s profit fell 92% in the first half of the year, due to a one-time and non-cash loss on account of the merger of its telecommunications arm with Vodafone Group Plc.】

item.title: 瑞士再保险公司成立工作组监测关税影响
item.description: 瑞士再保险公司（Swiss Re AG）成立了一个特别工作组，研究美国对瑞士和其他国家征收的关税对这家总部位于苏黎世的再保险公司有何影响。【原文：Swiss Re AG has set up a task force to see how the tariffs installed by the United States against Switzerland and other countries is impacting the Zurich-based reinsurer.】

item.title: 美国两年期收益率即将跌至 5 月以来最低水平
item.description: 美国短期债券收益率接近三个多月来的最低水平，反映出交易员们坚信美联储将在下个月降息。【原文：US short-dated bonds yields are near their lowest level in more than three months, reflecting conviction among traders that the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates next month.】

item.title: 挪威维持关键利率不变，2025年有望进一步放宽政策
item.description: 挪威央行在6月份意外下调借贷成本后保持稳定，并重申计划在今年晚些时候扩大宽松政策。【原文：Norway’s central bank kept borrowing costs steady after a surprise cut in June and reiterated its plan to extend easing later this year.】

item.title: 土耳其将年底通胀率预测维持在 24% 不变
item.description: 土耳其中央银行维持年底通胀预期不变，与市场和企业相比，保持了更为乐观的立场。【原文：Turkey’s central bank kept its year-end inflation forecast unchanged, maintaining a more optimistic stance than markets and businesses.】

item.title: 电子做市商Optiver加入LME推动金属交易
item.description: 电子做市商 Optiver Holding BV 正在加入伦敦金属交易所，这是对这家拥有 148 年历史的交易所在 2022 年镍危机后进行现代化改造的努力投下的信任票。【原文：Electronic market maker Optiver Holding BV is joining the London Metal Exchange, offering a vote of confidence in the 148-year-old exchange’s efforts to modernize in the wake of the 2022 nickel crisis.】

item.description:

item.title: 奇货可居：为什么榛子会成为下一个开心果（播客）
item.description: 在我们这个时代，供需双方都可能受到冲击。在供应方面，原因众所周知。大流行病、贸易战和气候破坏暴露了商品供应链的脆弱性，不胜枚举。在需求方面，某些商品突然在消费者中 "病毒式 "传播的趋势是无法预测的。以迪拜巧克力为例。开心果糖果的热潮突然出现，部分原因在于社交媒体。我们的嘉宾【原文：We’re in an age where shocks can occur on both the supply side and the demand side. On the supply side, the causes are well known. Pandemics, trade wars, and climate disruption have exposed the frailty of supply chains in goods too numerous to list. On the demand side, the tendency for certain goods to suddenly go “viral” among consumers can be impossible to predict. Take Dubai chocolate. The craze for pistachio-filled candy came out of nowhere, in part thanks to social media. Our guests on this】

item.title: 英国石油公司与埃尼集团的合资企业使纳米比亚石油勘探进入产出快车道
item.description: 英国石油公司（BP Plc）和埃尼公司（Eni SpA）的合资企业 Azule Energy 正在快速推进纳米比亚的石油业务，与包括道达尔能源 SE 在内的多家公司竞争，争取成为世界上最新热点地区之一的首批原油生产商。【原文：Azule Energy, a BP Plc and Eni SpA joint venture, is fast-tracking its Namibia oil operations as it competes with companies including TotalEnergies SE to be among the first to produce crude in one of the world’s newest hotspots.】

item.title: 摩根大通失去两名信贷交易员和香港销售主管
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，摩根大通公司最近失去了两名驻香港的信贷交易员以及当地的信贷销售主管，因为全球银行在亚洲对此类人才的争夺日趋白热化。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. has lost two Hong Kong-based credit traders recently along with its local head of credit sales, according to people familiar with the matter, as competition for such talent heats up among global banks in Asia.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行发现：竞争加剧导致每人损失 2,000 澳元
item.description: 根据储备银行的最新分析，从 2000 年代中期到 Covid-19 大流行期间，澳大利亚商业竞争的下降损害了生产力和家庭收入。【原文：A decline in business competition in Australia from the mid-2000s to the Covid-19 pandemic has hurt productivity and household incomes, according to new analysis by the Reserve Bank.】

item.title: Bending Spoons 融资 5 亿欧元收购更多科技公司
item.description: Bending Spoons 是一家连续收购软件企业的公司，目前已举债超过 5 亿欧元（5.85 亿美元），用于收购更多公司。【原文：Bending Spoons, a serial acquirer of software businesses, has raised more than €500 million ($585 million) in debt to buy more firms.】

item.title: 中国考虑要求中央政府运营的公司购买住房
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，中国正准备动员北京中央政府旗下的公司从陷入困境的房地产开发商手中购买未售出的房屋，而此前依靠地方政府的举措成效有限。【原文：China is preparing to mobilize companies owned by the central government in Beijing to purchase unsold homes from distressed property developers, following the limited success of a previous initiative that relied on local governments, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 电通计划削减海外业务 3400 个职位以降低成本
item.description: 日本广告公司电通集团周四发表声明称，将在日本以外的市场裁员约 3400 人，相当于该地区员工总数的 8%。【原文：Japanese advertising company Dentsu Group Inc. said it will cut about 3,400 jobs in markets outside of Japan, equivalent to 8% of its headcount in the region according to a statement Thursday.】

item.title: 英国经济增长超出预期，英镑延续近期连胜势头
item.description: 由于英国经济增长数据强于预期，英镑延续了近期相对于主要同类货币的优异表现。【原文：The pound extended its recent outperformance versus major peers as UK growth data came in stronger than expected.】

item.title: 印度在特朗普与普京峰会前四处寻找更多石油
item.description: 印度是世界上最大的俄罗斯原油进口国，印度的炼油厂正在全球范围内寻找替代供应，在美国和俄罗斯领导人举行峰会之前进行对冲。【原文：Refiners in India, the world’s top importer of seaborne Russian crude, are scouring the globe for alternative supplies, hedging their bets ahead of a summit between the US and Russian leaders.】

item.title: 泰国股票大涨，共同基金资产达到创纪录的 1920 亿美元
item.description: 泰国共同基金公司的资产在 7 月份攀升至创纪录的 6.2 万亿泰铢（约合 1920 亿美元），原因是全球股市反弹提振了这些公司的股票持有量，而且当地市场在大幅表现不佳后出现反弹。【原文：Thai mutual fund companies saw their assets climb to a record 6.2 trillion baht ($192 billion) in July, as a rally in global stocks boosted their equity holdings and local markets rebounded after a big underperformance.】

item.title: 中国仅存的几家建筑商之一在债务计划上出现转折
item.description: 中国开发商路劲基础设施有限公司（Road King Infrastructure Ltd.）正在暂停支付所有海外债务，这与几个月前该公司表示预计今年将有足够现金支付借款利息的说法大相径庭。【原文：Chinese developer Road King Infrastructure Ltd. is suspending all offshore debt payments, a reversal from a couple of months ago when it said it expected to have enough cash to pay interest on borrowings this year.】

item.title: Unite 将以 7.23 亿英镑收购竞争对手学生房东 Empiric
item.description: Unite Group Plc 同意收购竞争对手学生房东 Empiric Student Property Plc，交易价值约为 7.23 亿英镑（约合 9.81 亿美元），这是席卷英国房地产的整合浪潮的最新证据。【原文：Unite Group Plc agreed to buy rival student landlord Empiric Student Property Plc in a deal valuing the company at about £723 million ($981 million), the latest evidence of the wave of consolidation sweeping UK real estate.】

item.title: Centrica 和 ECP 斥资 15 亿英镑收购英国谷物液化天然气码头
item.description: Centrica Plc 和 Energy Capital Partners 同意从国家电网公司（National Grid Plc）手中收购英国格莱恩液化天然气终端，交易价值为 15 亿英镑（20 亿美元）。【原文：Centrica Plc and Energy Capital Partners agreed to purchase the Grain LNG terminal in the UK from National Grid Plc in a deal valued at £1.5 billion ($2 billion).】

item.title: 人工智能支出增加，英伟达合作伙伴鸿海利润攀升
item.description: 鸿海精密工业股份有限公司（Hon Hai Precision Industry Co.【原文：Hon Hai Precision Industry Co. posted a better-than-projected 27% rise in quarterly earnings, reflecting how AI demand is helping the Taiwanese company weather a moribund global consumer electronics market.】

item.title: 夏季气候转暖，嘉士伯上调盈利预期
item.description: 嘉士伯（Carlsberg A/S）将全年利润预期上调至上限，原因是该啤酒生产商受益于夏季温暖的天气和包括中国在内的高端啤酒需求回升。【原文：Carlsberg A/S nudged its full-year profit guidance to the upper end, as the brewer benefited from warm summer weather and a pickup in demand for premium beer including in China.】

item.title: 英国第二季度经济增长比预测快 0.3% (1)
item.description: 英国第二季度的经济表现好于预期，这让英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）松了一口气，但同时也提高了英国央行进一步降息的门槛。【原文：The UK economy fared better than expected in the second quarter, bringing some relief for Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves but raising the bar to further interest-rate cuts from the Bank of England.】
